LanguageData.HAZN_NeedSoil: Traps must be built on soil, dirt or sand
LanguageData.HAZN_NeedDistance: Hunting traps can not be built within 5 tiles of eachother
LanguageData.HAZN_DisableTrapDamageOverTime: Enable natural damage to the trap over time
LanguageData.HAZN_DisableTrapDamageOverTimeDesc: Disable trap damage over time and when an animal is caught
LanguageData.HAZN_SpawnInterval: Catch an animal every {0} hour(s) ({1} ticks):
LanguageData.HAZN_DmgInterval: Trap may receive damage after {0} hour(s) ({1} ticks):
LanguageData.HAZN_DmgIntervalToolTip: Higher value means longer time between damage. In game hours.
LanguageData.HAZN_AutoRebuildDesc: Place new blueprints after trap is destroyed
LanguageData.HAZN_AllowSpawnDesc: When disabled trap will not catch animals or receving damage over time
